import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; function ViewUser() { const location = useLocation(); const userData = location.state?.user; // Extract user data const name = userData.name; const phoneNumber = userData.phoneNumber; const email = userData.email; const address = userData.address; const status = userData.status const [error, setError] = useState(''); return (
